title: How AI Is Reshaping Paid Advertising Strategy for Small and Medium Businesses
description: The playing field between enterprise advertisers and smaller competitors has never been more level. Artificial intelligence tools that were once exclusive to companies with seven-figure marketing budgets are now accessible to businesses spending a fraction of that amount. This democratization is creating opportunities for agile operators who understand how to leverage these technologies effectively. The […]

title: US visa curbs, AI surge shape cautious outlook for Indian IT in 2026
description: NEW DELHI, Dec 23:  India’s USD 280-billion IT industry heads into 2026, balancing visa-related headwinds and global trade uncertainty against its biggest-ever push into artificial intelligence and the rapid expansion of global capability centres (GCCs). Heightened scrutiny of the US H-1B visa programme – including a proposed USD 100,000 fee for new visas and concerns over a potential 25 per cent outsourcing tax – has complicated cross-border delivery for Indian firms, even as companies accelerate efforts to reduce reliance on […]
content:

title: Guns and gold win in 2025, but other 'safety' trades bomb
description: Precious metals were the clear winner in 2025, while pretty much all other traditional "safe haven" investments underperformed. That's remarkable in a year marked by turbulence, conflict, and rumbling artificial intelligence bubble fears.

title: Greek Cabinet to Meet Under Mitsotakis as Government Pushes Anti
description: Greece’s Cabinet will meet at 11 a.m. Tuesday under Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis, with a wide-ranging agenda that includes a national anti-corruption digital registry, sweeping reforms to wildfire management and new rules on the use of artificial intelligence across government.
